comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Creates a prototype item stack based on this block that can be used with Container/ContainerSlot APIs.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Number of instances of this block to place in the itemstack.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Whether additional data facets of the itemstack are included.

comments.name: returns
comments.value:
An itemStack with the specified amount of items and data.
Returns undefined if block type is incompatible.
